div.p: OF THE DAY, JESUS AND KIDS, IF A KID GOES TO PUBLIC SCHOOL AND
HAS A NON-RELIGIOUS HOME, CHANCES ARE THE KID LEARNS ABOUT
RELIGION OFTEN WHEN PEOPLE GET ANGRY, I DESIGNED A BOOK AFTER
THE BOOK IS ILLUSTRATED, FULL OF TERRIFIC PICTURES AND THE SAME
COMPELLING STORY LINE THAT ABOUT 2 MILLION READERS HAVE
EXPERIENCED IN KILLING JESUS, MUCH NEEDED IN THIS COUNTRY, SO
YOU PARENTS AND GRANDPARENTS GET THESE IN THE HANDS OF THE
URCHINS, WITH EASTER COMING UP. HEY YOU KNOW WHAT?
THEY WILL REALLY LIKE IT, IT IS AN INTERESTING PHENOMENON HOW WE
PUT THAT TOGETHER. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, WE HOPE
YOU CHECK IT OUT. FINALLY, KANSAS CITY, MISSOURI,
NAILED IT. EQUALITY IS NOT POSSIBLE, AN
